result.title: Chat Group
result.content:
By the way, if I were to have communication network, do you prefer Skype, Google Hangout, or Facebook? And can somebody start this chat?

BTW, here is my contact info:

Email: minimario1729@gmail.com

FB: https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100008806539729

I guess we have split here; anyone who wants to can create chat, just be sure to invite everyone who posted here
